messages.body: Hello, I'm having trouble accessing the Advanced React Course materials. When I click on Module 3, it says 'Access Denied' even though I purchased the full course.
Hi there! I'm sorry you're having trouble accessing the course. Let me check your account status and permissions right away.
I've found the issue - there was a glitch in our course access system. I've reset your permissions and you should now have full access to all modules. Could you please try accessing Module 3 again?
Yes, I can access it now! Quick question - are the project files for this module available for download? I'd like to work on them offline.
Absolutely! You can find all project files in the 'Resources' tab of each module. They're available as ZIP files with both starter code and completed versions. Let me know if you need anything else!
